about_the_game:
X4: Community of Planets Collector's Edition - Bonus Content includes:

  • Yasur ship*: at the start of the Multiverse Team Seasons, you will have immediate access to the light fighter ship Yasur in your Venture Inventory (additional units can be earned during ventures)

  • Exclusive Paintmod "Pearl Prospect"**

  • X4 2023 Artbook: including never before published concept art from X4's expansions

  • X Novel "Farnham's Legend", in a new English translation from 2023, as well as its German original (.epub and .pdf)

It also includes the bonus content from the previously available X4: Foundations Collector's Edition:

  • X Universe Artbook

  • X Novel "Nopileos", in English and German versions (.epub and .pdf)

  • X Encyclopedia, in English and German versions

The bonus content will be placed in your X4 installation folder: ...SteamSteamAppscommonX4 FoundationsBonus Content

* Starting with the X4: Foundations Update 6.20 Public Beta in Summer 2023, a new in-game interface will be introduced, allowing you to claim your Yasur in an offline game. You will still need to register an Egosoft account in the Egosoft forums, connect your game to your Egosoft account in your User Control Panel and log in in-game using this account.

**To access your exclusive Pearl Prospect paintmod (10 copies per savegame), you will need to register an Egosoft forum account, connect your game to your Egosoft account in your User Control Panel (Egosoft forums) and log in in-game using this account. Once unlocked, you won't need to be connected to the internet to use the paintmod in X4. If you have already linked your forum account to your Steam account, please go to your forum profile and click on the Update via Steam button on the Egosoft Settings tab.
